metadata.title: Complete Genome Sequence of a Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome-Related Coronavirus from Kenyan Bats

abstract.original_text: We identified a strain of betacoronavirus BtKY72/Rhinolophus sp./Kenya/ 2007 (here BtKY72) from rectal swab samples in Kenyan bats. This paper reports the complete genomic sequence of BtKY72, which is closely related to BtCoV/BM48-31/ Bulgaria/2008, a severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS)-related virus from Rhinolophus bats in Europe.

sentences.segment_text: We identified a strain of betacoronavirus BtKY72/Rhinolophus sp. / Kenya / 2007 ( here BtKY72 ) from rectal swab samples in Kenyan bats .
This paper reports the complete genomic sequence of BtKY72 ,
which is closely related to BtCoV/BM48 -31 / Bulgaria/2008 ,
a severe acute respiratory syndrome ( SARS ) - related virus from Rhinolophus bats in Europe .
